quotes.quote: The conscious mind may be compared to a fountain playing in the sun and falling back into the great subterranean pool of subconscious from which it rises.
Pool side is my best side.
Pool Time.
It’s just you and the pool.
Hanging by the pool.
When I dip, you dip, we dip!
When you have the whole pool to yourself.
Pool hair, don’t care
And we’ll all float on okay
Sun’s out, buns out.
Life is cool by the pool.
Too pool for school
“Quit pool-ing my leg”
“We’re pool for the summer”
Seas the day.
"Water you doing?"
To infinity pool, and beyond.
Happiness is a day at the pool.
Memories made at the pool last a lifetime.
Prove to me that you're no fool Walk across my swimming pool.
The pool glitters, the fishes leap in the sun With joyous fins, and dive in the pool again.
By the pool that I see in my dreams, dear love,  I have sat with you time and again and listened beneath the dank leaves, dear love, to the sibilant sound of the rain.

A pool is, for many of us in the West, a symbol not of affluence but of order, of control over the uncontrollable. A pool is water, made available and useful, and is, as such, infinitely soothing to the western eye.
Safe is good for sidewalks and swimming pools, but life requires risk if we are to get anywhere.
If someone throws you in a pool and you can't swim, you're going to struggle.
Somedays you're the cue ball, somedays you are the eight ball
Swimming Pool was a very important moment for me because the character was written for me.
